title: Cooking state
description:
There is a gap in coverage in my kitchen zone. When I'm standing at my oven I'm outside of the zone. This causes issues for me - I'm preparing a meal and the lights go out. This is the primary reason for the 30s delay on kitchen absence. 30s does not appear to be long enough but I don't think the solution is to keep extending the timeout. I'm now thinking I need a helper to store state. Something like:

- toggle "cooking" scene (maybe this needs to be script or automation)
- set a helper to track that I'm in this state
- update "leaving kitchen" to respect this, leave lights alone
- update "leaving charlie meal" to respect this, leave lights alone
- add a method for me to indicate I'm "done cooking"
- reset helper to off state

Review existing scripts, automations etc and build out a complete plan.
close_reason: Implemented cooking mode feature with input_boolean helper, toggle script, and updated kitchen presence automation to respect cooking mode

title: Create a lock down automation
description: Give me some ideas for what I might want to do in an automation to lock down my place as I go to sleep.
close_reason: Implemented lock_down script and updated bedroom button long-press to trigger it

title: kitchen presence override
description: The automation around kitchen presence should not reset the lights if they are already on. e.g. i set the "cooking" scene by voice then step into the kitchen. the presence automation shouldn't reset the already bright lights.
close_reason: Added condition to skip adaptive lighting if kitchen lights are already on. Now presence automation only activates lights when they're off, preserving manual scenes like Cooking.
